uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.osgi

Enum ServiceWrapper.HideServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ServiceWrapper.HideServices>
      • uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.osgi.ServiceWrapper.HideServices
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ServiceWrapper.HideServices>
    Enclosing interface:
    ServiceWrapper<T>

    public static enum ServiceWrapper.HideServices
extends java.lang.Enum<ServiceWrapper.HideServices>

    Enumeration of possible values for the ServiceWrapper.HIDE_SERVICES property of any ServiceWrapper services.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ALWAYS
      Always remove services applicable by class from the service registry, so only the wrapping service will be visible.
      NEVER
      Never remove wrapped services from the service registry, so both will be visible.
      SILENTLY
      This option behaves in the same way as WHEN_WRAPPED, with the added stipulation that wrapping and unwrapping will be invisible to bundles which are already using the services being wrapped.
      WHEN_WRAPPED
      This value indicates that services will only be hidden in the case that a valid wrap will be provided instead, which is often safer than ALWAYS.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • ALWAYS

        public static final ServiceWrapper.HideServices ALWAYS

        Always remove services applicable by class from the service registry, so only the wrapping service will be visible. Be careful, as this will act as a filter, only registering wrapping services for those which are successfully wrapped, simply removing them otherwise. If no services are matched by ServiceWrapper.wrapServiceProperties(Map) then none will be available to any bundles, no matter what service ranking the wrapper has.

        The default value when none is provided is WHEN_WRAPPED.

      • NEVER

        public static final ServiceWrapper.HideServices NEVER
        Never remove wrapped services from the service registry, so both will be visible.

      • WHEN_WRAPPED

        public static final ServiceWrapper.HideServices WHEN_WRAPPED
        This value indicates that services will only be hidden in the case that a valid wrap will be provided instead, which is often safer than ALWAYS.

      • SILENTLY

        public static final ServiceWrapper.HideServices SILENTLY
        This option behaves in the same way as WHEN_WRAPPED, with the added stipulation that wrapping and unwrapping will be invisible to bundles which are already using the services being wrapped.

    • Method Detail

      • values

        public static ServiceWrapper.HideServices[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (ServiceWrapper.HideServices c : ServiceWrapper.HideServices.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
